## News

**September 16, 2025:** Luis Sierra Muntan√© has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2025-26 academic year. Luis begins his term immediately.

**April 25, 2025:** Statistics Graduate Student Research Day 2025. See this year's program and more information about the event [here](https://sgsu-uoft.github.io/ResearchDay2025/).

**September 15, 2024:** Konstantinos Christopher Tsiolis has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2024-25 academic year. KC begins his term immediately.

**September 16, 2023:** Mandy Yao has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2023-24 academic year. Mandy begins her term immediately.

**June 22, 2022:** Liam Welsh has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2022-23 academic year. Liam will begin his term in July. 

**April 11, 2022:** The 12th annual Statistics Student Research Day will be held this year on May 25th, 2022. For information about the event, click [here](https://sgsu-uoft.github.io/ResearchDay2022/).
